fullplot: After the disastrous results of his last expedition, Carl Denham leaves New York aboard a ship to escape all the trouble. After a mutiny, he and a few companions are left behind on Skull island, where they meet a smaller relative of King Kong and make friends with him.
plot: The men who captured the giant ape King Kong, return to his island and find his equally gigantic, but far more friendly, son.
title: The Son of Kong
